music.name: MusicBot

error.activeThread:
Music thread is already active in this server!
{0}
error.missingRole: Roles required to use the bot: `{0}`

client.noPermissions: I am missing the required permissions to join your channel!

user.notConnected: You are not in a voice channel!
user.differentChannel: We are not in the same channel!

voice.failedJoining: Could not join your voice channel!

queue.title: Music queue
queue.footer: Add youtube songs by typing them in the  thread.

thread.name: Music thread!
thread.archivedName: Used to be a music thread...

play.description: Play a youtube song or playlist by typing it's name or url in the Music thread.
play.maxSongs: There can only be around 10000 songs in the queue!

pageForward.description: `>`: Shows the next page of songs in the queue.

pageBackward.description: `<`: Shows the previous page of songs in the queue.

loopQueue.label: Loop
loopQueue.description: `Loop`: Loops all the songs in the queue.

jumpForward.label: +20s
jumpForward.description: `+20s`: Jumps 30 seconds forward in current song.

replay.description: `↺`: Replays the currently playing song from the beginning.

stop.description: `◼`: Stops the music completely. Requires double clicking for confirmation.
stop.confirm: Click on `◼` again if you are sure you want to stop the music.
stop.reply: These are the songs you have removed from the queue, you can paste the whole file or just it's content back in to the thread.

edit.description: `▼`: Shows additional buttons for managing the queue.

forward.label: Push Forward
forward.description: `Push Forward`: Sends a selected song to the start of the queue.

dropdown.placeholder: Select the songs you want to push to the front.

remove.label: Remove
remove.description: `Remove`: Removes the songs selected in a dropdown from the queue.

dropdown.placeholder: Select the songs you want to remove.

shuffle.label: Shuffle
shuffle.description: `Shuffle`: Shuffles all the songs in the queue.

expand.label: Wider Embed
expand.description: `Wider Embed`: Shows complete names of the songs in the queue.

clear.label: Clear
clear.description: `Clear`: Removes all the songs from the queue.
clear.confirm: Click on `Clear` again if you are sure, you want to remove all the songs from the queue.
clear.reply: These are the songs you have removed from the queue, you can paste the whole file or just it's content back in to the thread.

music.clientRestarted:
> ㅤBot has been restarted
> ㅤdue to a new update.
music.innactivityDisconnect:
> ㅤBot has disconnected due to:
> ㅤ- disconnected by another member,
> ㅤ- innactivity.
music.help: Sorry, there is no help available.

slashCommands.name: help
slashCommands.description: Sends info about the utility bot commands!

slashCommands.name: poll
slashCommands.description: Starts a new poll for users to vote on!

options.name: responses
options.description: A list of poll responses, separated by ';'

help: Type '<response>' in the thread to add a response to the poll.
Type 'remove <idx>' in the thread to remove a response by it's index (index el. [0, #reponses])
Question may be changed by typing 'question <question>' in the message's thread to change the poll's question.
Click the 'commit' button to finish editing the poll.
Reply 'edit' to the poll message to start editing again.
Reply 'resend' to the message or type 'resend' in the thread to resend the poll message in a channel.

slashCommands.name: roles
slashCommands.description: Creates a new message for adding and removing roles with buttons!

options.name: title
options.description: The title of the roles message

help: Select the roles you want to add to the message in a dropdown.
Only roles lower than bot's highest role will appear.
Navigate between the pages of roles with '<' and '>'.
Select the roles again to remove them from the message.
Click the 'commit' button to finish editing the roles message.
Reply 'edit' to the roles message to start editing again.
Reply 'resend' to the message to resend the roles message in a channel.
Reply '<new-name'> to change the title of the roles message.

slashCommands.name: config
slashCommands.description: Set up which roles are allowed to use a command

options.name: command
options.description: Select a command you want to change the allowed roles for.

options.name: role1
options.description: The first role allowed to use the command

options.name: role2
options.description: The second role allowed to use the command

options.name: role3
options.description: The thrid role allowed to use the command

help: This command may only be used by the administrators.
Select the command and up to three roles that may use the selected slash command.
Members without those roles are still be able to use some features of a command. (Example: They may vote on the poll, but they cannot start a new poll or add responses to the poll... )

roles.selectRolesToRemove: Select the roles you want to add or remove.

poll.replyToThread: Reply with the responses in the thread.

thread.name: Poll Thread
thread.reason: Adding responses and the question to the poll.

config.resetRoles: Reset allowed roles for `{0}`. Now everyone can use it and it's subcommands.
